name: AddButtonCommand
description: Adds a button to the UI in the specified container.

container_id.description: The ID of the container where the button will be placed.

button_id.description: A unique identifier for the button.

text.description: The label text displayed on the button.

name: AddSliderCommand
description: Adds a slider input to the UI in the specified container.

container_id.description: The ID of the container where the slider will be placed.

slider_id.description: A unique identifier for the slider.

label.description: The label text displayed next to the slider.

min_val.description: The minimum value of the slider.

max_val.description: The maximum value of the slider.

default_val.description: The default value of the slider.

name: AddTextCommand
description: Adds a text element to the UI in the specified container.

container_id.description: The ID of the container where the text will be placed.

style.description: The style of the text (header, body, or code).

name: ClearContainerCommand
description: Removes all UI elements from the specified container.

container_id.description: The ID of the container to clear.
